paragraphs.1: This client required of a simple branding design. They wanted to keep it simple and clean
paragraphs.2: Since this company works with a variety of business like hospitality, real estate, foods and drinks and finance, we needed to create a brand identity that could work with all their different areas.

paragraphs.1: For that, we focused most of all on their colors: beige, blue and white
paragraphs.2: For the logo we combine two things: the name and an elephant

paragraphs.1: We managed to design the logo out of the silhouette of an elephant.
paragraphs.2: The G represents the back of the elephant and the back legs. The P represents the ears and the elephant’s trunk. We think this is a dynamic logo that suites all their different business. What do you think?

paragraphs.1: This website was build for a law firm that specializes in crypto currencies and tech companies.
paragraphs.2: The idea was to mix the elegance and seriousness of a law firm with the tech side of the crypto currencies.

paragraphs.1: The website allows their clients to get in touch with them in the easiest way by just clicking on a WhatsApp bubble that's in the page.
paragraphs.2: Also, to reach more audience on browsers we added a blogs page and add to the page basic principles of SEO as well as the Google Search Console's set up.

paragraphs.1: This website is 100% responsive. You can open it in any device and it will look great!
paragraphs.2: Go to www.lawgorithmic.io to visit the web.
